column1: Smoque BBQ////They serve numerous types of foods
column2: so you have where to choose from. You must also taste their sauce
column3: it is incredible! Another aspect that I particularly liked was the hospitality of the staff. Even though there were a lot of customers
column4: they struggled to satisfy everyone's needs. I went there with several friends
column5: and they helped us find a place where to sit
column6: and they let us know when the food was ready. All employees were nice and polite
column7: and I also have to mention that we didn't wait too much until our order arrived. The prices are affordable and if you like BBQ
column8: you should definitely try this gem.
